title: Patient data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' This is a Patient resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Identifier' An identifier for this patient.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

_active.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

name.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/HumanName' A name associated with the individual.

items.description: A human's name with the ability to identify parts and usage.

telecom.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/ContactPoint' A contact detail (e.g. a telephone number or an email address) by which the individual may be contacted.

items.description: Details for all kinds of technology mediated contact points for a person or organization, including telephone, email, etc.

gender.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_gender.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

birthDate.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/date' A date or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). There is no time zone. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth and date.  Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_birthDate.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

deceasedBoolean.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

_deceasedBoolean.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

deceasedDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

_deceasedDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

address.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Address' An address for the individual.

items.description: An address expressed using postal conventions (as opposed to GPS or other location definition formats).  This data type may be used to convey addresses for use in delivering mail as well as for visiting locations which might not be valid for mail delivery.  There are a variety of postal address formats defined around the world.

maritalStatus.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

multipleBirthBoolean.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' Indicates whether the patient is part of a multiple (boolean) or indicates the actual birth order (integer).

_multipleBirthBoolean.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

multipleBirthInteger.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/' Indicates whether the patient is part of a multiple (boolean) or indicates the actual birth order (integer).

_multipleBirthInteger.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

items.description: For referring to data content defined in other formats.

contact.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Patient_Contact' A contact party (e.g. guardian, partner, friend) for the patient.

items.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

communication.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Patient_Communication' A language which may be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health.

items.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.
A reference from one resource to another.

managingOrganization.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

link.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/Patient_Link' Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual patient.

items.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'Patient'
